Changelog for kss.plugin.cacheability

    (name of developer listed in brackets)

    - Fix the url construction for server actions. This
      will get rid of the double // before the action name.
      [ree]

kss.plugin.cacheability - 0.1

    - Initial go at using GET requests so that they can be cached on the
      server. [ree]

    - Initial package structure.
      [ree]
